articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage on New Year's Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage on New Year's Day
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage on January 1 to give new year blessings to the children.
					 Beloved children offered new year greetings to him, presenting bouquets to him.
					
					 He said he came to the baby home and orphanage right after finishing his New Year address to meet the children there on the New Year's Day as he had promised to do so during his visit to the newly built baby home and orphanage in October last year.
					
					 He went round various places including the dining rooms, child-care rooms, education rooms, sleeping rooms, wading pools and rooms for intellectual games to see how the children spent the New Year's Day.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied to see highly nutritive and special food on the tables for children. His face beaming with a broad smile, he said he was very pleased to see the children having a pleasant time on the New Year's Day.
					
					 Noting that all the facilities at the Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage fully reflect the advantages of the socialist system of the country, he underlined the need for the officials and employees there to fulfill their responsibility to make sure that the children feel the party's warm love for the younger generation and future.
					
					 Calling for bringing up the children in such a manner that they may nurture good moral traits, creativity and independence so that service personnel of the People's Army, doctors and heroes may be produced from among them, he said to do so, all the nurses and teachers should have good qualities as educators as well as motherly warm love.
					
					 He enjoyed an art performance given by children and had a photo taken with them.
					
					 Saying that the whole country will become bright only when happy laughter of the children is heard, he added that the laughter of the children, their song "We Are the Happiest in the World" will ring out louder on this land making the revolution.
					
					 Asking again the officials, nurses, teachers and employees of the baby home and orphanage to successfully bring up the children as their real mothers would do, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by Han Kwang Sang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Pays Highest Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Pays Highest Tribute to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 paid the highest tribute and offered New Year greetings to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, representing the boundless reverence of the service personnel and people.
					 He, at the same, extended New Year greetings to the service personnel and people who are striving with devotion for the dignity and prosperity of the country with revolutionary faith and patriotic enthusiasm, wishing the families throughout the country would overflow with warm affection and our lovely children would have a brighter future.
					
					 His New Year greetings went also to the compatriots in the south and abroad who are fighting for national concord and reunification and to the progressive peoples of the world and other foreign friends who aspire after independence and peace.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Refers to Achievements Made by DPRK Last Year
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Refers to Achievements Made by DPRK Last Year
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 said that last year was a year of brilliant triumph in which the foundations for hastening final victory on all fronts of building a thriving nation were consolidated firmly and the invincible might of the DPRK was demonstrated under the leadership of the Party.
					 Last year the harmonious whole of the Party and the masses of the people was solidified and the purity and might of the revolutionary ranks strengthened, he said, and went on:
					
					 The ardent yearning of our service personnel and people for President Kim Il Sung and General Kim Jong Il became intenser as the days went by and they fully manifested their passionate loyalty and pure sense of moral obligation to translate into reality the great leaders' plans and wishes. Our Party's politics of love for the people and younger generation and its policy of attaching importance to science and education were embodied in reality and thereby the people's trust in the Party deepened and our single-hearted unity hardened. Amid the drive for carrying on education in revolutionary traditions through the study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the Mt. Paektu area, the entire army and the whole society came to pulsate with the spirit and mettle of Paektu and bubble with the conviction and will to carry through the sacred revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Last year the fighting efficiency of the People's Army was increased remarkably and national defence capability was built up.
					
					 Last year we made great progress in the building of a socialist economic giant and civilized nation by the joint operation of the army and people.
					
					 An upswing was brought about in production in different sectors including agriculture, fishery and chemical and coal-mining industries, opening up bright prospects for the building of an economic giant and improvement of the people's living standards. The construction sector kindled the fierce flames for creating the Korean speed to build many monumental structures that serve as standards and models of Juche-oriented architecture, thereby actually demonstrating the looks of the DPRK that is realizing its beautiful ideals.
					
					 Our sportspeople undauntedly fought by our own style of tactics in the 17th Asian Games and world championships to exalt the honour of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Underlines Need to Consolidate Country's Might as Socialist Political and Ideological Power
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Underlines Need to Consolidate Country's Might as Socialist Political and Ideological Power
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 said that the new year 2015 will be a year of great significance, in which the DPRK will mark the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Upholding the slogan "Let us all turn out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu!" all the service personnel and people should charge dynamically towards the venue of grand October celebrations, he noted, and pointed out:
					
					 This year we will further consolidate our country's invincible might as a socialist political and ideological power.
					
					 We should invariably hold up the President and the General forever as the sun of Juche, staunchly championing and adding eternal brilliance to their immortal revolutionary exploits.
					
					 In this year we should set up a new milestone in improving the Party's leadership ability and fighting efficiency.
					
					 We should steadily intensify the work of establishing the Party's monolithic leadership system to make the whole Party share ideology with the Party Central Committee, breathe the same breath as it and keep pace with it. All Party organizations should maintain implementing the Party's lines and policies as the major line of Party work, and carry every of them to completion unconditionally.
					
					 We should ensure that the people-first principle runs through the whole of Party work as appropriate for its nature as a motherly party to make the climate of respecting, loving and depending on them pervade it and Party work focus on improving their living standards.
					
					 We should hold fast to ideology as the Party's powerful weapon and make an ideological offensive to consolidate the ideological position of our revolution rock-solid.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Calls for Fresh Turn in Building Revolutionary Armed Forces and Enhancing Defence Capability
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Calls for Fresh Turn in Building Revolutionary Armed Forces and Enhancing Defence Capability
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 said that this year the DPRK should further demonstrate the country's might as a military power by bringing about a fresh turn in building revolutionary armed forces and enhancing its defence capability. He continued:
					 The People's Army should thoroughly establish the Party's monolithic command system across the entire army and vigorously conduct the movement of winning the titles of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment and Guards Unit. Thus it should implement to the letter the Party's four-point strategic line and three major tasks for increasing military strength. It should effect a turnaround in improving the quality of training by eliminating formalism and stereotyped patterns in combat and political training and updating its contents and methods. It should maintain full combat readiness so that it can repulse any provocation by the enemy in one stroke.  By bringing about a radical turn in its supply service, it should provide soldiers with better living conditions and make all its battalions and companies elite combat ranks and their dear villages and homes that adjoin the yard of the office of the Party Central Committee. In the future, too, it should be a pioneer and example in the struggle
					
					 to implement the Party's ideas and safeguard its policies in pursuance of its plan for building a thriving nation.
					
					 In line with the requirements of the prevailing situation, the officers and men of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces should sharpen the sword for defending the leader, system and people, and members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards should conduct combat and political training in a real-war atmosphere, thereby beefing up their combat efficiency and getting fully prepared for an all-people resistance so that they can defend their own provinces, counties and villages by themselves.
					
					 By carrying out the Party's line of promoting the two fronts simultaneously, the defence industry sector should step up the efforts to make the munitions production Juche-oriented, modern and scientific and proactively develop and perfect powerful cutting-edge military hardware of our own style.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Advances Tasks to Effect Upswing in Building Socialist Economic Giant and Civilized Nation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Advances Tasks to Effect Upswing in Building Socialist Economic Giant and Civilized Nation
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 called for giving definite precedence to science and technology and effecting an upswing in building a socialist economic giant and civilized nation. He pointed out:
					It is a determination and will of our Party to rapidly develop all sectors and build a people's paradise by dint of science and technology. The front of science should forcefully rush ahead in the vanguard of a thriving socialist country building, thereby foiling the enemy's pernicious moves for sanctions and encouraging all the economic sectors to make rapid headway on the strength of the high-running spirit of independence and of science and technology. 
					
					We should make maximum use of the existing foundations and all potentials of the self-supporting economy, so as to bring about a turn in improving the people's living standards and building an economic giant.
					
					We should resolve the food problem of the people and improve their dietary life on a higher level with agricultural production, animal husbandry and fishing as the main thrusts.
					
					The light industry sector should work out a strategy for fending for itself and put production at central and local light-industry factories on normal track. 
					
					We should direct great efforts to relieving the shortage of electricity and strive to shore up its vanguard sectors and key industries. 
					
					We should raise a stronger wind of creating the Korean speed in the construction sector so as to build power stations, factories, educational and cultural establishments and dwelling houses as befit the monumental edifices in the era of the Workers' Party. 
					
					The whole Party, the entire army and all the people should turn out in the campaign to turn the mountains of the country into "mountains of gold" thickly wooded with trees.
					
					We should bring about a radical improvement in education in the new century by arousing state and social interest in the role of officials in this sector and educational work, thereby making fresh progress in making all the people well versed in science and technology and developing ours into a talented nation.
					
					The whole country should bubble with enthusiasm for sports and our sportspeople should fly higher the flag of the Republic at international games to open up bright prospects for building a sporting power. 
					
					The sector of art and literature should do away with stagnation and produce larger numbers of contemporary masterpieces, and the public health sector should improve the hygienic and anti-epidemic work and preventive and curative medical care and boost pharmaceutical production.
					
					We should make sure that national sentiments and noble and beautiful lifestyle prevail across society, and press on with national heritage conservation as a patriotic undertaking involving the whole country and all the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Set Forth Ways of Carrying out This Year's Tasks
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Set Forth Ways of Carrying out This Year's Tasks
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address for 2015 indicated the ways of carrying out the enormous goal of struggle for this year.
					 He said:
					
					 All the officials, Party members, service personnel and other working people should live and work in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 The whole country should overflow with the spirit of patriotic devotion with which to hold dear and add brilliance to our own things.
					
					 Officials, leading participants in the revolution, should be the standard-bearers and vanguard fighters in the ongoing general offensive.
					
					 They should faithfully serve the country and people for their prosperity and well-being with a noble outlook on patriotism and firm preparedness for devoted service and, shouldering heavy burdens by themselves, make redoubled efforts in the van of the masses. With a full understanding of the Party's ideas and intentions, officials should go deep among the masses and rouse them to carry through its lines and policies unconditionally at the cost of their lives. They should be fully accountable to the Party and the state for the work in their sectors and units, eliminate defeatism, self-preservation and expediency and do everything in an innovative and scientific way.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Deals with Issue of National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Deals with Issue of National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for 2015 dealt with the issue of national reunification. He went on:
					 Last year we put forward crucial proposals for improved inter-Korean relations and national reunification and made sincere efforts for their implementation. Our efforts, however, could not bear due fruit owing to the obstructive moves by the anti-reunification forces within and without; instead the north-south relations have been on a headlong rush to aggravation.
					
					 However complicated the situation may be and whatever obstacles and difficulties may stand in our way, we should unfailingly achieve national reunification, a lifetime wish of the President and the General and the greatest desire of the nation, and build a dignified and prosperous reunified country on this land.
					
					 "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!"-this is the slogan of struggle the entire Korean nation should hold up.
					
					 We should remove the danger of war, ease the tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should discontinue all war moves and choose to ease the tension on the Korean peninsula and create a peaceful environment.
					
					 The United States should desist from pursuing the anachronistic policy hostile towards the DPRK and reckless acts of aggression and boldly make a policy switchover.
					
					 The north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity true to the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation.
					
					 We think that it is possible to resume the suspended high-level contacts and hold inter-sector talks if the south Korean authorities are sincere in their stand towards improving inter-Korean relations through dialogue.
					
					 And there is no reason why we should not hold a summit meeting if the atmosphere and environment for it are created.
					
					 In the future, too, we will make every effort to substantially promote dialogue and negotiations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Deals with Issue of Foreign Relations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Deals with Issue of Foreign Relations
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address for 2015 dealt with the issue of foreign relations. 
					 He went on:
					
					 Last year, in the international arena, hostilities and bloodshed persisted in several countries and regions due to the imperialists' outrageous arbitrariness and undisguised infringement upon their sovereignty, which posed a serious threat to global peace and security.
					
					 Especially, owing to the United States' extremely hostile policy aimed at isolating and suffocating our Republic, the bulwark of socialism and fortress of independence and justice, the vicious cycle of tension never ceased and the danger of war grew further on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The present situation eloquently demonstrates that we were just in our efforts to firmly consolidate our self-reliant defence capability with the nuclear deterrent as its backbone and safeguard our national sovereignty, the lifeblood of the country, under the unfurled banner of Songun.
					
					 As long as the enemy persists in its moves to stifle our socialist system, we will consistently adhere to the Songun politics and the line of promoting the two fronts simultaneously and firmly defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation, no matter how the international situation and the structure of relations of our surrounding countries may change.
					
					 Our Party and the government of our Republic will solidify in every respect the bond and solidarity with the world's progressive peoples who love peace and aspire after independence and justice, and strive to develop good neighborly relations with all the countries that respect our national sovereignty and are friendly to us.

articles.title: Pyongyang in Festival Atmosphere
articles.content:
Pyongyang in Festival Atmosphere
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Citizens in Pyongyang are enjoying New Year holidays at water parks, riding club, dolphinarium and other amusement places in different parts of the city.
					 Kim Son Jo and Ko Ok Song living in Central District, when interviewed by KCNA in the Munsu Water Park, said that they felt refreshed after having a glorious time in the park.
					
					 The Mirim Riding Club is also crowded with youngsters in riding dress, while the dolphinarium and the People's Pleasure Park in Rungna Islet are thronged with citizens.
					
					 The happy looks of Pyongyangites give a glimpse of the future of a highly civilized socialist nation.

articles.title: New Year Address Having Public Response
articles.content:
New Year Address Having Public Response
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- All the army and people of the DPRK are deeply stirred by the New Year address given by Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, on the New Year's Day.
					 So Tong Sop, an officer of the Korean People's Army (KPA), told KCNA:
					
					 It is the greatest glory and pride of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK that they received the New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The New Year address recalls the passion I felt when receiving his order "Forward to the Final Victory!" in the military parade held on the occasion of the birth centenary of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It greatly encourages all the servicepersons to take the lead in the general advance for the final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 As clarified in the New Year address, we will carry out to the letter the four-point strategic line and three major tasks for increasing military strength to maintain full combat readiness and be a pioneer and example in the struggle to implement the ideas of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and safeguard its policies.
					
					 Ri Myong Son, director of the Natural Energy Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's New Year address promises the fresh progress and victory in the struggle to build a thriving nation.
					
					 It is his firm determination and will to rapidly develop all sectors of national economy and build a people's paradise by dint of science and technology.
					
					 In hearty response to the militant tasks advanced in the New Year address, I will make a great innovation in scientific research.
					
					 His address serves as guidelines in making the general offensive this year to hasten final victory in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Puppet Group Accused of Tightening Its Military Nexus with Japan
articles.content:
Puppet Group Accused of Tightening Its Military Nexus with Japan
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and other organizations in Taejon held a press conference before the Taejon City Office on Dec. 29 at which they accused the puppet group of opting for boosting the humiliating military cooperation with Japan, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 The organizations said that the fact that the military agreement on sharing information among south Korea, the U.S. and Japan was actually signed in the form of contract on Dec. 26, stunning the public. They blasted the regime for handling the important issue directly related to safety and peace on the Korean Peninsula without the knowledge of not only the "National Assembly" but of the people. 
					
					 They denounced Park Geun Hye's "government" for clinching the deal for concluding it even with the U.S. involved.
					
					 They called upon Park Geun Hye to immediately apologize for seeking the military cooperation with Japan unrepentant of its past crimes.

articles.title: Retraction of Contract on Sharing Information Denounced in South Korea
articles.content:
Retraction of Contract on Sharing Information Denounced in South Korea
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities signed a contract on sharing information little short of a military agreement with the U.S. and Japan on Dec. 26 last year, sycophantic and treacherous act.
					 More than 40 civic and social organizations and organizations of youth and students and religionists held a joint press conference outside the puppet Ministry of Defense in Seoul in denunciation of the traitorous action on Dec. 29 last year. 
					
					 Speakers at the press conference said that the present regime embarked upon the road of depending on Japan for military affairs, not content with dependence on the U.S.
					
					 The danger of this contract is to provide all military secret-information to Japan, they said. 
					
					 Its main goal is to establish U.S.-led tripartite missile defense system and thus conduct missile operations against the north, the speakers said, urging the authorities to retract the contract at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Highly Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Highly Praised Abroad
Pyongyang, January 1 (KCNA) -- Events were held in different countries between December 21 and 24 last year on the occasion of the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They included a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in      Dmitrov City, Moscow Region of Russia, round-table talks by the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar and a lecture at the Almami Samori Toure Barracks of the Guinean Army.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos dealing with the Songun leadership exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were famous works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 The deputy mayor of Dmitrov City said that in a matter of three years Kim Jong Un successfully carried out the behests of Kim Jong Il by turning the DPRK into a space power and a nuclear power and strengthened the people's army into the matchless army. During the days he demonstrated his distinguished ability as the supreme commander, the deputy mayor added.
					
					 The acting secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that the army and people of the DPRK will certainly build a thriving nation and reunify the country, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il, as they are holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem at the helms of the party, state and army.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Events took place in foreign countries from Dec. 16 to 20 to mark the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA), the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the KPA and the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 They included celebration meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Cuba, Sweden and Switzerland.
					
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos documenting the undying exploits of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included the Korean film "Arms of Korea."
					
					 Juan Jose Leon Vega, first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting the Reunification of Korea, referred to the revolutionary careers of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Suk and sincerely hoped that the Korean people would certainly reunify the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, in a speech fully supported the Korean people in their efforts to develop economy and bolster up defence capability under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee, expressed conviction that the service personnel and people of the DPRK would register bigger successes in their drive for building a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Great Career of Kim Jong Suk Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Great Career of Kim Jong Suk Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Media of various countries dedicated special write-ups to the 97th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk between Dec. 20 and 24.
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Kim Jong Suk, faithful woman's life" illustrated with a photo of her statue.
					
					 Noting that she was born into a patriotic family and embarked upon the road of revolution in her early years, the article added:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk devotedly defended and remained true to the idea and intention of President Kim Il Sung and dedicated herself to ensuring his safety.
					
					 Her life was a great one that set a practical example of how to uphold the leader and a brilliant one totally dedicated to the liberation of the country and victory of the revolution.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will never forget her revolutionary career and undying exploits and make dynamic efforts in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, true to the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and thus surely turn their country into a thriving nation.
					
					 The Indonesian paper International Media and the Bangladeshi paper Blitz carried articles including "Anti-Japanese war hero". They praised Kim Jong Suk for devotedly defending Kim Il Sung and demonstrating her matchless bravery, superb strategy and distinguished marksmanship during the great anti-Japanese war.  
					
					 The Guinean Domestic, International and Seven National Languages Broadcasting Services aired programs introducing the immortal life and exploits of the anti-Japanese war hero who is always alive as the incarnation of the fighter who devotedly defended the leader.

articles.title: Peruvian Political Parties Accuse S. Korean Regime of Forcibly Disbanding Progressive Party
articles.content:
Peruvian Political Parties Accuse S. Korean Regime of Forcibly Disbanding Progressive Party
Pyongyang, January 2 (KCNA) -- Peruvian political parties vehemently denounced fascist politically-motivated terrorism of the south Korean authorities.
					 The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru noted in a statement on Dec. 26:
					
					 The present south Korean authorities undesirous of democracy, independence and reunification took issue with the Unified Progressive Party over its programme and activities and suppressed it. At last they prodded the "constitutional court" into forcibly dissolving the party.
					
					 The Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, as a political party aspiring after democracy, sovereignty, progress and prosperity, resolutely denounce the south Korean authorities' action  as fascist politically-motivated terrorism.
					
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union noted in a statement on the same day:
					
					 The outrageous act of forcibly disbanding a legitimate political party is politically-motivated terrorism that even regimes of capitalist countries dare not do.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is the fact that the south Korean authorities openly asserted the party was forcibly disbanded because it represented forces "following the north" and its leading members are "spies of the north."
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to immediately stop its fascist violence and politically-motivated terrorism against all Koreans desirous of social democracy and the reunification of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito el dia primero el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang y felicito a los huerfanos que acogen el Ano Nuevo.
					Los ninos graciosos entregaron los ramos de flores al Mariscal y le dirigieron saludos del Ano Nuevo.
					
					Kim Jong Un dijo que vino tan pronto como terminara la pronunciacion del mensaje del Ano Nuevo para cumplir la promesa hecha con los ninos en octubre del ano pasado al recorrer el hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang.
					
					Pasando revista a varios lugares como el comedor, la sala de crianza, la de educacion, el dormitorio, la piscina y la sala de juego intelectual, averiguo como pasan la fiesta los huerfanos.
					
					Al ver las mesas de alimentos llenas de sabrosos y nutritivos platos, el Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que saltan a la vista los preparativos sinceros del Ano Nuevo para los huerfanos.
					
					Esbozo una sonrisa viendo a los ninos pasando la fiesta con alegria.
					
					Asevero que en todas las instalaciones del hospicio y orfanato esta sintetizada la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais y encomendo a los funcionarios y empleados de alli que cumplieran su responsabilidad para transmitir a los huerfanos el amor de nuestro Partido por las generaciones venideras.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de fomentar a los huerfanos las correctas cualidades morales, la creatividad, la individualidad y la independencia, de modo que en el futuro salieran entre ellos los militares, doctores y heroes. Para el fin es necesario que las criaderas y las educadoras posean el calido amor maternal y la alta capacidad como educadoras, agrego.
					
					Luego de presenciar la funcion artistica del Ano Nuevo ofrecida por los huerfanos, el Mariscal se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Apunto que todo el pais sera mas claro cuando alli se alcen las risas de los ninos y subrayo que en este territorio, en que hacemos la revolucion, resonaran mas las risas de los ninos y el canto "No envidiamos nada a nadie en el mundo".
					
					Volvio a encomendar a los funcionarios, criaderas, educadoras y empleados del hospicio y orfanato de Pyongyang que crien bien a los huerfanos con el sentimiento maternal y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, el primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il y la subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Yo Jong.

articles.title: Se disparan en Pyonyang fuegos artificiales por Ano Nuevo 2015
articles.content:
Se disparan en Pyonyang fuegos artificiales por Ano Nuevo 2015
Pyongyang, 1 de enero (ACNC) -- En ocasion del Ano Nuevo 104 (2015) de la Era Juche, tuvo lugar en esta capital el lanzamiento de fuegos artificiales.
					A medianoche del dia 31 de diciembre del 2014, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares concurrieron a la Plaza Kim Il Sung, la colina Mansu, el puente Okryu y a lo largo de la orilla del rio Taedong donde esta erguido el Monumento a la Idea Juche, para ver el disparo de salvas.
					
					A la hora cero de 2015, se tiraron junto con la campanada de la vispera del Ano Nuevo los fuegos artificiales al cielo nocturno. 
					
					Las salvas formaron un mundo maravilloso como si fuera una expresion de sublime homenaje al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					La lluvia de chispas redoblo al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea la alegria y jubilo de Ano Nuevo.
					
					Al lanzarse de continuo los fuegos artificiales adornando con varios colores el cielo nocturno, los gritos efusivos de las masas  estremecen el cielo y la tierra.

articles.title: Pueblo coreano celebra con mucha alegria fiesta del Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Pueblo coreano celebra con mucha alegria fiesta del Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 2 de enero (ACNC) -- Tras escuchar por la manana del dia primero el mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, todos los hogares y los ninos coreanos pasan la fiesta con mucha alegria.
					Los capitalinos acuden al Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu, el Club de Equitacion de Mirim, el acuario de delfines de Rungna y otras bases de descanso cultural.
					
					En entrevista con la ACNC, el anciano de capitalino municipio de Jung, Kim Son Jo, dijo que antes pasaban la fiesta con juegos folkloricos como yut, rehilete y cometa, pero, ahora, en las modernas bases culturales.
					
					El Area de Recreo del Pueblo de Rungna esta llena de visitantes que no olvidan visitar el acuario de delfines y el salon de videojuegos.
					
					Los visitantes, que pasan la primera fiesta del ano nuevo en las modernas basas culturales preparadas por el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, redoblan la decision de trabajar mucho mas para hacer realidad sus suenos e ideales.
